title: Dream on Mount Tam
lyrics:
It was in a living dream
Smooth like sculpted ice
A spirit guide appeared
Before my eyes
Frozen underneath the mask

I wanted it to last

Keeping the seas so low

And all the creatures here below



With the sweetest kiss

One I've never known

Couldn't make sense

In this sphere alone



It's scientifically

[?] by the trees

But the balance has been tipped

Contract's been ripped



Rise with me

Rise with me

Rise with me

Rise with me

Rise with me
